title: Rani Bangle - A Timeless Vanki Design
materials: studded with high-quality Zirconia and highlighted with Emerald and Ruby accents. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Intricately designed Vanki pattern featuring a central circular motif surrounded by floral filigree. The bangle boasts a delicate openwork design. The emerald and ruby accents are bezel set to highlight their rich color and add a traditional touch.
colors: and brilliant white (Zirconia). The use of red and green symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings
occasions: and milestone celebrations. The Rani Bangle adds a touch of regal elegance to any attire
description: This Rani Bangle represents the pinnacle of South Indian craftsmanship, blending tradition with contemporary design. Its intricate filigree and gemstone detailing showcase meticulous artistry. The 22K gold ensures lasting value, while the classic Vanki design is an enduring symbol of heritage and status. The high quality of the materials and impeccable Hyderabadi polish guarantee durability and lasting beauty.
